data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 9,874 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Maine-et-Loire, Pays de la Loire, France
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Maine-et-Loire to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 81 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Maine-et-Loire, Pays de la Loire, France that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Lord, help the people of Maine-et-Loire, Pays de la Loire, France to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Saumur
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Saumur, Pays de la Loire, France.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Maine-et-Loire words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the county of Maine-et-Loire. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.focus_label: Maine-et-Loire, Pays de la Loire, France

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Maine-et-Loire, Pays de la Loire, France.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
